sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next'; import { trackPricingView } from '../../utils/analytics'; const PricingSection: React.FC = () => { const { t } = useTranslation(); return (

{t('pricing.title')}

{t('pricing.subtitle')}

{/* Starter Package */}

{t('pricing.starter.name')}

{t('pricing.starter.subtitle')}

{t('pricing.starter.price')}

{t('pricing.starter.description')}

{t('pricing.starter.perfectFor')}

  • {t('pricing.starter.features.checkout')}
  • {t('pricing.starter.features.webhooks')}
  • {t('pricing.starter.features.confirmation')}
  • {t('pricing.starter.features.testMode')}
  • {t('pricing.starter.features.delivery')}
trackPricingView('Starter Package')} > {t('pricing.starter.button')} →
{/* Growth Package */}
{t('pricing.growth.mostPopular')}

{t('pricing.growth.name')}

{t('pricing.growth.subtitle')}

{t('pricing.growth.price')}

{t('pricing.growth.description')}

{t('pricing.growth.idealFor')}

  • {t('pricing.growth.features.billing')}
  • {t('pricing.growth.features.proration')}
  • {t('pricing.growth.features.dunning')}
  • {t('pricing.growth.features.portal')}
  • {t('pricing.growth.features.delivery')}
trackPricingView('Growth Package')} > {t('pricing.growth.button')} →
{/* Scale Package */}

{t('pricing.scale.name')}

{t('pricing.scale.subtitle')}

{t('pricing.scale.price')}

{t('pricing.scale.description')}

{t('pricing.scale.idealFor')}

  • {t('pricing.scale.features.connect')}
  • {t('pricing.scale.features.fees')}
  • {t('pricing.scale.features.compliance')}
  • {t('pricing.scale.features.monitoring')}
  • {t('pricing.scale.features.delivery')}
trackPricingView('Scale Package')} > {t('pricing.scale.button')} →
); }; export default PricingSection;
